Jaadugar

2022 | 2h 48m | Comedies

A small-town magician with zero interest in football must lead his local team to the finals of a tournament if he wishes to marry the love of his life.

Starring: Jitendra Kumar,Arushi Sharma,Jaaved Jaaferi

Watch all you want.

Jeetu meets magic meets football meets love. Dil behlane nahi, dil jeetne aa raha hai Jaadugar. Now streaming only on Netflix
